sentences.english: Sheldon: Well, I actually might be able to help.
sentences.chinese: 其实，实际上我可以提供些协理。

sentences.english: So that it ca help more people ; live heisternativehier life.

sentences.english: Some people were trying to help the driver get out of the dwoulmaged car.
sentences.chinese: 有些人试图协理驾驶员取得损坏的汽车。

sentences.english: The director asked you, the deputy will not when?
sentences.chinese: 处长问你，这个协理员还要不要当了？

sentences.english: Norrine Bailey Spencer is the associate provost and director of undergraduate admissions.
sentences.chinese: 劳瑞拉贝雷斯宾塞是负责本科招生的协理主任。
